alert.note: Alert for Montcalm (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 01 at 3:55PM EST until February 03 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM WEDNESDAY TO 11 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Montcalm county. * WHEN...From 2 AM Wednesday to 11 PM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes on Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain will change to snow around midnight. Expect wet snow trough the morning commute time than snow, moderate at times will continue into the early evening before diminishing to light snow. This will cause issues for both the morning and evening commute, so plan ahead to leave early and or take a different route.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
